discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
Not certain, but it seems they are looking for Bindings, which would mean C
 is correct
"A SAML binding specifies the mapping of SAML assertion and/or protocol message exchanges with standard messaging formats or communication protocols like SOAP exchanges."
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/cucm/SAML_SSO_deployment_guide/15/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-release-15/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-12_5_chapter_01.html

questions.question_text: Which component of SAML SSO defines the transport mechanism that is used to deliver the SAML messages between entities?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct
"SAML Assertion: It defines the structure and content of the information that is transferred from IdPs to service providers."
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/cucm/SAML_SSO_deployment_guide/15/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-release-15/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-12_5_chapter_01.html

questions.question_text: Which SAML component defines the content of data transferred from an IdP to a service provider?

discussion.content:
D is correct
"Unified Communications 10.0 supports the SAML 2.0 Web Browser SSO Profile."
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/cucm/SAML_SSO_deployment_guide/12_5_1/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-12_5/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-12_5_chapter_01.html

questions.question_text: Which SAML 2.0 profile is supported by Cisco UCM, Cisco Unified IM and Presence, and Unity Connection version 10.x and above?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct
see Fig.1 Step 11
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/cucm/SAML_SSO_deployment_guide/15/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-release-15/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-12_5_chapter_01.html

choices.D: The browser issues an HTTPS POST request to the IdP.
choices.C: The service provider issues an authentication challenge to the browser.
choices.B: The LDAP server extracts the assertion.
choices.A: The IdP redirects the SAML response to the browser.

questions.question_text: What is a step in the SAML SSO process?
What submits credentials to the LDAP server during a call that uses SAML SSO?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct
see Fig.1 Step 8 "The IdP in turn submits the credentials to the LDAP server."
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/cucm/SAML_SSO_deployment_guide/15/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-release-15/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-12_5_chapter_01.html
